attribute.value: select ejg.yyjg from KHFA_YYJG_JG ejg inner join KHFA_FAPZ epz on ejg.fabh = epz.fabh and epz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and epz.khdx = '1' and epz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_jgcy ecy on ejg.khdxdh = ecy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between ecy.qsrq and ecy.jsrq where ejg.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and ecy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$

select yyjg-coalesce(fpjx,0) as kfpjx from ( select yyjg.khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,sum(yyjg.yyjg) yyjg from KHFA_YYJG_JG yyjg inner join KHFA_FAPZ fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 where yyjg.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ( select cy.jgkhdxdh from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq ) group by yyjg.khdxdh ) a left join ( select cy.jgkhdxdh ,sum(kfp.fpjx) as fpjx from SGDR_ECKHJXFP kfp inner join khdx_jgcy cy on kfp.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where kfp.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and kfp.khdxdh in ( select fcy.khdxdh from khdx_jgcy kcy inner join khdx_jgcy fcy on kcy.jgkhdxdh = fcy.jgkhdxdh and kcy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and $tjrq_ym$ between kcy.qsrq and kcy.jsrq and $tjrq_ym$ between fcy.qsrq and fcy.jsrq ) group by cy.jgkhdxdh ) b on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh

select 1 from ( select cy.jgkhdxdh ,yyjg.yyjg from khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg inner join khfa_fapz fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_jgcy cy on yyjg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and cy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where yyjg.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ )) b inner join ( select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from sgdr_eckhjxfp a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq where a.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) and b.jgkhdxdh in(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) AND a.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ group by b.jgkhdxdh ) a on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh where a.fpjx>b.yyjg

select ejg.yyjg from KHFA_YYJG_JG ejg inner join KHFA_FAPZ epz on ejg.fabh = epz.fabh and epz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and epz.khdx = '1' and epz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_jgcy ecy on ejg.khdxdh = ecy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between ecy.qsrq and ecy.jsrq where ejg.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and ecy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$

select yyjg-coalesce(fpjx,0) as kfpjx from ( select yyjg.khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,sum(yyjg.yyjg) yyjg from KHFA_YYJG_JG yyjg inner join KHFA_FAPZ fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 where yyjg.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ( select cy.jgkhdxdh from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq ) group by yyjg.khdxdh ) a left join ( select cy.jgkhdxdh ,sum(kfp.fpjx) as fpjx from SGDR_ECKHJXFP kfp inner join khdx_jgcy cy on kfp.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where kfp.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and kfp.khdxdh in ( select fcy.khdxdh from khdx_jgcy kcy inner join khdx_jgcy fcy on kcy.jgkhdxdh = fcy.jgkhdxdh and kcy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and $tjrq_ym$ between kcy.qsrq and kcy.jsrq and $tjrq_ym$ between fcy.qsrq and fcy.jsrq ) group by cy.jgkhdxdh ) b on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh

select 1 from ( select cy.jgkhdxdh ,yyjg.yyjg from khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg inner join khfa_fapz fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_jgcy cy on yyjg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and cy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where yyjg.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ )) b inner join ( select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from sgdr_eckhjxfp a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq where a.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) and b.jgkhdxdh in(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) AND a.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ group by b.jgkhdxdh ) a on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh where a.fpjx>b.yyjg

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select jxfp.tjrq ,jg.jgmc ,hy.khdxdh,hy.hydh ,hy.hymc ,hylb.LBMC ,yyjg.yyjg eckhjxb,yyjg.yyjg-a.fpjx as kfpjx ,jxfp.fpjx ,jxfp.bzsm from SGDR_ECKHJXFP jxfp left join khdx_jgcy cy on jxfp.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq left join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh left join khdx_hy hy on jxfp.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh left join khdx_hylb hylb on jxfp.khdxdh = hylb.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq left join KHFA_YYJG_JG yyjg on 1=1 and yyjg.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ and jg.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh inner join KHFA_FAPZ fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 left join ( select jg1.khdxdh, sum(fp.fpjx) as fpjx from SGDR_ECKHJXFP fp left join khdx_jgcy cy1 on fp.khdxdh = cy1.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy1.qsrq and cy1.jsrq left join khdx_jg jg1 on cy1.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh where 1=1 and fp.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ group by jg1.khdxdh ) a on jg.khdxdh = a.khdxdh where jxfp.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jxfp.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ order by jxfp.tjrq ,jg.jgdh,hy.hydh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select jxfp.tjrq ,jg.jgmc ,hy.khdxdh,hy.hydh ,hy.hymc ,hylb.LBMC ,yyjg.yyjg eckhjxb,yyjg.yyjg-a.fpjx as kfpjx ,jxfp.fpjx ,jxfp.bzsm from SGDR_ECKHJXFP jxfp left join khdx_jgcy cy on jxfp.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq left join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh left join khdx_hy hy on jxfp.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh left join khdx_hylb hylb on jxfp.khdxdh = hylb.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq left join KHFA_YYJG_JG yyjg on 1=1 and yyjg.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ and jg.khdxdh = yyjg.khdxdh inner join KHFA_FAPZ fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 left join ( select jg1.khdxdh, sum(fp.fpjx) as fpjx from SGDR_ECKHJXFP fp left join khdx_jgcy cy1 on fp.khdxdh = cy1.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy1.qsrq and cy1.jsrq left join khdx_jg jg1 on cy1.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh where 1=1 and fp.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ group by jg1.khdxdh ) a on jg.khdxdh = a.khdxdh where jxfp.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jxfp.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ order by jxfp.tjrq ,jg.jgdh,hy.hydh ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select KHDXDH, BZSM, FPJX,F_TIMETOCHAR(CZSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ from SGDR_ECKHJXFP where 1= 1 and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select KHDXDH, BZSM, FPJX,F_TIMETOCHAR(CZSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ from SGDR_ECKHJXFP where 1= 1 and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq_ym$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGDR_ECKHJXFP( KHDXDH, CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ, FPJX, BZSM ) values ( $khdxdh$,f_get_timestamp('$czsj$'),'$czr$',$tjrq_ym$,$fpjx$,'$bzsm$')
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_ECKHJXFP set FPJX = $fpjx$,BZSM = '$bzsm$' where 1=1 and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq_ym$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_ECKHJXFP where 1=1 and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq$
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select ejg.yyjg from KHFA_YYJG_JG ejg inner join KHFA_FAPZ epz on ejg.fabh = epz.fabh and epz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and epz.khdx = '1' and epz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_jgcy ecy on ejg.khdxdh = ecy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between ecy.qsrq and ecy.jsrq where ejg.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and ecy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select yyjg-coalesce(fpjx,0) as kfpjx from ( select yyjg.khdxdh as jgkhdxdh,sum(yyjg.yyjg) yyjg from KHFA_YYJG_JG yyjg inner join KHFA_FAPZ fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 where yyjg.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and yyjg.khdxdh in ( select cy.jgkhdxdh from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq ) group by yyjg.khdxdh ) a left join ( select cy.jgkhdxdh ,sum(kfp.fpjx) as fpjx from SGDR_ECKHJXFP kfp inner join khdx_jgcy cy on kfp.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where kfp.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and kfp.khdxdh in ( select fcy.khdxdh from khdx_jgcy kcy inner join khdx_jgcy fcy on kcy.jgkhdxdh = fcy.jgkhdxdh and kcy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and $tjrq_ym$ between kcy.qsrq and kcy.jsrq and $tjrq_ym$ between fcy.qsrq and fcy.jsrq ) group by cy.jgkhdxdh ) b on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select 1 from ( select cy.jgkhdxdh ,yyjg.yyjg from khfa_yyjg_jg yyjg inner join khfa_fapz fapz on yyjg.fabh = fapz.fabh and fapz.famc like '%二次考核绩效包%' and fapz.khdx = '1' and fapz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_jgcy cy on yyjg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh and cy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$ and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where yyjg.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ )) b inner join ( select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from sgdr_eckhjxfp a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq where a.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) and b.jgkhdxdh in(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) AND a.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ group by b.jgkhdxdh ) a on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh where a.fpjx>b.yyjg

javascript.query: jQuery(document).ready(function () { editpage_height=450; editpage_width=450; jQuery('#tjny').executeOnEvent('blur','eckhjxfp_getYm',getYm); jQuery('#tjny').blur(); }); function getYm(){ var o_qsrq = createTimeObj(jQuery('#tjny').val()); jQuery('#tjny_ym').val(o_qsrq.ym); } //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ return true; }
javascript.edit: var flag = true; jQuery(document).ready(function () { //这里的js脚本，会在页面加载完成后执行 var o_qsrq = createTimeObj(jQuery('#tjrq').val()); jQuery('#tjrq_ym').val(o_qsrq.ym); $("#tjrq").blur(function(){ var o_qsrq = createTimeObj(jQuery('#tjrq').val()); jQuery('#tjrq_ym').val(o_qsrq.ym); }); $("#tjrq").executeOnEvent('change','eckhjxfp_getEckhjxb',selGetEckhjxb); $("#tjrq").executeOnEvent('change','eckhjxfp_getKfpjx',selGetKfpjx); $("#khdxdh").executeOnEvent('change','eckhjxfp_getEckhjxb',selGetEckhjxb); $("#khdxdh").executeOnEvent('change','eckhjxfp_getKfpjx',selGetKfpjx); $("#fpjx").executeOnEvent('blur','eckhjxfp_getFpjx',selGetFpjx); }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ //return PAS.di.isDone(); return flag; } function selGetEckhjxb(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ $("#eckhjxb").val(obj.data[0].YYJG); } } function selGetKfpjx(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ $("#kfpjx").val(obj.data[0].KFPJX); }else { $("#kfpjx").val(0.0000); } } function selGetFpjx(obj){ console.log(obj.data.length); if(obj.data.length>0){ custom_alert('分配绩效按机构汇总不能大于机构二次考核绩效包!'); flag = false ; } }
